item.title: Kat add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "That's funny because if anyone actually did prove the existence of God we'd just tell him 'nice proof, Fraa Bly' and start believing in God." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Kat add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "If you sincerely believed in God, how could you form one thought, speak one sentence, without mentioning Him?" -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Kat add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "I do not scruple to employ mendacity and a fictitious appearance of female incompetence when the occasion demands it." -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Kat add a quote by elizabeth peters
item.description: "Most men are reasonably useful in a crisis. The difficulty lies in convincing them that the situation has reached a critical point" -- elizabeth peters

item.title: Kat add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "If all else fails, we will simply have to drug our attendants, overpower the guards, raise the oppressed peasants to arms, and take over the government." -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Kat add a quote by Georgette Heyer
item.description: "I feel an almost overwhelming interest in the methods of daylight abduction employed by the modern youth." -- Georgette Heyer

item.title: Kat add a quote by Georgette Heyer
item.description: "No one could have called Mr. Standen quick-witted, but the possession of three sisters had considerably sharpened his instinct of self-preservation." -- Georgette Heyer

item.title: Kat add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "Wizard Howl," said Wizard Suliman. "I must apologize for trying to bite you so often. In the normal way, I wouldn't dream of setting teeth in a fellow countryman." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: Kat add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "I'm going up to my room now, where I may die." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: Kat add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "I do hope you have some money. I'm getting tired of hitting people." -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Kat add a quote by Georgette Heyer
item.description: "What a leg. What an air. A most engaging smile." -- Georgette Heyer

item.title: Kat add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "If you took a couple of David Bowies and stuck one of the David Bowies on the top of the other David Bowie, then attached another David Bowie to the end of each of the arms of the upper of the first two David Bowies and wrapped the whole business up in a dirty beach robe you would then have something which didn't exactly look like John Watson, but which those who knew him would find hauntingly familiar." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kat add a quote by Helen Fielding
item.description: "That is such crap. How dare you be so fraudulently flirtatious, cowardly and dysfunctional? I am not interested in emotional fuckwittage. Goodbye." -- Helen Fielding

item.title: Kat add a quote by Helen Fielding
item.description: "Alcohol units: 5. Drowning sorrows. Cigarettes: 23. Fumigating sorrows. Calories: 3,856. Smothering sorrows in fat duvet." -- Helen Fielding

item.title: Kat add a quote by P.G. Wodehouse
item.description: "She has an eye like a man-eating fish" -- P.G. Wodehouse
